name: Floors II
description:
EARLY ACCESS: Not all features might be completed and/or included in the game yet.

This sequel to Floors follows pretty much the same basic concept as Floors, with some major improvements including: An always increasing amount of entities to challenge the player, some tasks that would have to be completed by players to proceed climbing the never ending stair case.

Floors II is a horror game where you are placed in a never ending stair case roaming with a never ending amount of harmful entities. An entity can appear at any given floor, at any given time. The further you venture up or down this stair case the harder the game becomes and the more entities start chasing you. At some points you will be required to complete tasks on a specific floor in order to proceed venturing up or down the stair case.

How many floors can you survive in how many seconds?

Minimum Specs: 4Gb RAM, Intel Core i3, 100Mb Storage

THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES! PLAY AT OWN RISK!
